name: WP Adf.ly Dashboard and Integration
author: Vincenzo Luongo

sections.description: WP Adf.ly Dashboard and Integration is a plugin allows you to configure Full Page Script, Website Entry Script, Pop-Ads tools and Dashboard widget for stats
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-adf-ly-dashboard-integration to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Edit the plugin settings by clicking “AdFly Integration Settings” on the settings navbar
sections.faq:
This is official plugin?

No

Is there a premium version available?

There is currently no premium version available.

Where can I get the user id, public api key and secret api key?

Setup an free account and get your credential from Adf.ly Tools Page – API Documentations
